Title: Vintage Bulova LCD Quartz Men's Watch c1977, Working, Orig Band
ConditionDescription: Very nice original 1977 Bulova 'LCD Quartz' men's watch, working with new batteries, original band!
Description: Up for sale is a Men's 1977 Bulova 'LCD Quartz' Watch Very neat and original watch, working quartz LCD movement, original band. Case and Caseback: all stainless steel in good condition; shows some wear and scratches; approx 37mm width and 41mm length Lug-2-Lug, dated N7 (1977); markings on backside are hard to read, but state: Bulova N7|Stainless Steel Case|Water Resistant|8057 SWISS.Crystal: flat crystal, clean and clear, nice condition.Dial: clean dial with LCD readout, may be difficult to see in sunlight and at certain angles; signed Bulova. Movement: LCD quartz model in working condition, shows hr/min/sec on main screen; month/date/day on second screen using the top button; lower left button activates a rather dim light for viewing in the dark; has two new battery cells; service history is unknown.Band: Original stainless steel bracelet, in nice used condition with some signs of wear and scratches, signed clasp; current and approx max size is 7.5" and can be resized smaller through the clasp by moving the springbar. Other: No box or manuals included. Please review all photos for best description and evaluation.Note, this is a smaller sized watch; please consider this before purchasing.Please allow for some inaccuracies with vintage watches.Additional photos and details available upon request.
